name: qkCrypto
tagline: A Quantum Key Distribution system, based on BB84, using emulated photons, and written in Java/C/Ruby/Python.
body:
### Who
@JakeXSV || jakeh.prather@gmail.com

### What
A Quantum Key Distribution system, based on BB84, emulated photons, and written in Java/C/Ruby/Python.

### Where
```
git clone https://github.com/Jakehp/qkCrypto.git myqkCrypto
```
### Why
I stumbled upon the subject on Wikipedia and it was really interesting. So I decided to try and wrap my head around the concept, protocol and implementation.

It's awesome.

### Future
Write it.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
